channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Tesla sales plunge in France, showing Elon Musk may have a long way to go to restore the brand
item.description: Tesla’s sales have been under pressure in Europe, even after the rollout of a souped-up Model Y.

item.title: Congressional Robotics Caucus relaunches to help U.S. industry

item.title: ‘I am getting very frustrated’: My mother’s adviser has not returned my calls. He manages $1 million. Is this normal?
item.description: “I am not used to this way of doing business.”

item.title: Aethir enables better user acquisition via Instant Play streaming for Doctor Who: Worlds Apart
item.description: Aethir provides better computing efficiency with its Instant Play streaming solution for Doctor Who: Worlds Apart.

item.title: Why the government’s debt problem is your borrowing problem — but also your opportunity to save
item.description: People shopping for a car loan or a mortgage should understand the implications of high bond yields.

item.title: My life partner is 18 years my senior. He wants to leave his $4.5 million fortune to me — not his two kids. Do we tell them?
item.description: “No doubt they would feel the arrangement is unfair, and that would potentially end our relationship.”

item.title: Model Context Protocol: A promising AI integration layer, but not a standard (yet)
item.description: Enterprises should experiment with MCP where it adds value, isolate dependencies and prepare for a multi-protocol future.

item.title: Micro Center nerd store fills the Fry’s vacuum with its return to Silicon Valley
item.description: Micro Center, an electronics retailer, has opened a store in Silicon Valley in California And so the nerd kingdom has returned.

item.title: The future of engineering belongs to those who build with AI, not without it
item.description: As we look ahead, the relationship between engineers and AI systems will likely evolve from tool and user to something more symbiotic.
